title: Sans help please
content:
Hi

I'm looking for this sans font. I love the really clean lowercase 'a' and the way the top of the bowl joins the stem.

Can anyone recognise it? BTW I've looked for better images but can't find any with more detail than these two.

I'll kick myself if you identify it as a common font I should know!

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202150136im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sanmarino_4289.jpg)
author: skypete

comments.content:
Wow—thanks Jan—Wonderful and spot on.

I've just kicked myself!
